review.title: “Great place to work”
review.pros: Pros – Mellon is a very well organized place of business. the policies and procedure and very well documented and precise. They have prepared themselves for most situations that arise form being a foundation. Hierarchy is in place and very structured. Atmosphere is pleasant and enjoyable.
review.cons: Cons – If you enjoy chaos this is not the place for you. If you can't be polite and pleasant on a daily basis don't work here.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
